channel.title: Npc help [argh, plz? =D]
channel.description:
hey i need some help :rolleyes:
so i spawn npc, at autospawn.cfg oh great i compile and run hes there! :D what turns out? He wasent in my server (so he had like 0hp etc)
what did i do next? npc.cfg
great, i added there:
[code]npc = 3590 Steel Dragon 304 607 5[/code]
Now my monster got hp :D but he don't hit me, hes like 100% 0 hit.. how i change this? Need help :p
thx , ur best friend santa

item.title: Npc help [argh, plz? =D]
item.dc:creator: @Sp_Santa Sp Santa
item.description:
@Sp_Santa wrote:

hey i need some help :rolleyes:

so i spawn npc, at autospawn.cfg oh great i compile and run hes there!
what turns out? He wasent in my server (so he had like 0hp etc)

what did i do next? npc.cfg

great, i added there:

npc = 3590	Steel Dragon			304	607	5

Now my monster got hp
but he don’t hit me, hes like 100% 0 hit… how i change this? Need help

thx , ur best friend santa
